title: Time Person of the Year
summary: Person of the Year (called Man of the Year or Woman of the Year until 1999)[1] is an annual issue of the United States news magazine and website Time that features and profiles a person, a group, an idea, or an object that "for better or for worse... has done the most to influence the events of the year".[2] Time also runs an annual reader's poll that has no effect on the selection, which is made solely by the magazine's editors.[3]
